manual_test_checklist: - Frontend: Navigate to /tools/ssl, enter 'expired.badssl.com', verify red 'Expired' badge
- Frontend: Enter 'google.com', verify green 'Valid' badge and days remaining > 30
- Expected: 400 error or friendly DNS error
- Frontend: Enter invalid host, verify error message
- Frontend: Enter 'example.com:8443', verify connection to custom port
- Test 'Test cert' button (dev mode only) - should auto-fill expired.badssl.com
- Verify error messages for invalid hosts (504 timeout, 422 parsing, 400 validation)
- Verify SAN list displays as chips
- Check days remaining color coding (red <=0, amber <30, green >=30)
- Test with valid certificate - chain_valid should be true
- Test with self-signed certificate - chain_valid should be false
warnings: cryptography package is required for full SSL parsing. Install with: pip install cryptography
If cryptography is not available, SSL checker will return limited functionality with errors array
Chain validation requires SSL_VALIDATE_CHAINS=true in backend .env (defaults to false)
6-second timeout is enforced for all connections
10-minute in-memory cache is used for repeated checks (cleared when cache exceeds 100 entries)
